title: Need help to win games
body: I had the last two solo ranked games were people didn't know how to wait for ganks or just don't know how to farm safelyI had an Illaio didn't have armor and I had thornmail for GP. I need a duo. I got myself out of Bronze 5 in this account and once last season in another account.

replies.body:
I am bronze, on promos to bronze 1, my MMR is silver 2 according to op.gg, I used to be very bad and raged at every loss, so i quit league and just watched streamers play league, what i found in common from all of them is that they analyse their gameplay, knowing what items to build, understanding your role, including looking further ahead of the game, eg, not wasting your flash just for an auto that has less than 0% chance on securing a kill, also developing mechanics and understanding when to engage and disengage (after they use their abilities). 
When i came back to league, (a week ago) I smashed bronze 5 and now on bronze 1 promos with a silver 2 mmr, the most thing i found helpful is teaching your teammates how to play and what to do, and including what to build, especially when your support is lux and starts with dorans ring. and what i also found helpful was that when a teammate secured a kill, i would say 'gj', however if they fail, i would tell them 'wp, better luck next time, farm up and we can win together'. this boosted my teams gameplay and won me a lot of games. check my op,gg for proof, https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=razorscythe188
idk if this is useful to you, but i hope you might be able to pick a thing or two out of it.

The first question to ask yourself, do you want to climb fast or do you want to just have fun in your ranked games. 

If it is to climb, then consider playing carry roles where you can dominate lane and like translate the won lane into other lanes or just keep pressuring your own lane to make more enemies go to your lane which means your allies (if they're losing) have less pressure by the enemy so they can catch up in a sense. 

What role do you play and what is your champ pool?
